text:
Arivale | Full Stack Developer | Seattle, WA | ONSITE

I'm currently building out the engineering team at a company that was just nominated as one of Seattle's most promising tech startups (http://www.geekwire.com/2015/meet-the-seattle-10-these-innov...).

There's a lot of opportunity for early engineers. I'd love to talk.

Arivale is launching an entirely new sector based on scientific wellness with a goal to maximize wellness and aid in minimizing disease. Our scientific co-founder, Lee Hood, is a pioneer in the study of human genetics and helped invent 5 instruments at the heart of modern genetics. Dr. Hood has co-founded over a dozen biotech companies, including Amgen, Applied Biosystems, Systemix, Darwin, and Rosetta. We joined Arivale because we are highly optimistic about the potential to make a positive difference in the lives of millions of people.

You can find us at www.arivale.com, and apply by sending a note to techjobs@arivale.com.
